    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox16950561">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16950561">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16950561">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content16950561">
          <p>
           Contact:
           <br />
           <br />
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16950561" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox16950562">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16950562">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16950562">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I find a U.S.-based, public, parent company?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16950562">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16950562" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link21467377">
              <a id="link_21467377" href="https://www.census.gov/epcd/ec97brdg/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(21467377,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Accounting', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 21467377}); ">
               Bridge Between NAICS and SIC
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Connects old with new industrial classification.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19993703">
              <a id="link_19993703" href="http://www.lexisnexis.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/hottopics/lnacademic/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19993703,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Accounting', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19993703}); ">
               Lexis-Nexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search by company name or SIC to find major competitors within an industry.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link21467333">
              <a id="link_21467333" href="https://www.osha.gov/pls/imis/sicsearch.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(21467333,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Accounting', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 21467333}); ">
               Standard Industrial Classification Manual
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Allows the user to search the 1987 version SIC manual by keyword, to access descriptive information for a specified 2,3,4-digit SIC.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16950563">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16950563">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16950563">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Where can I find 10-K annual reports?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16950563">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16950563" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link19993724">
              Company websites
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Choose "investor relations" link or similar link to locate annual reports
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19993729">
              <a id="link_19993729" href="http://www.sec.gov/edgar.shtml" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19993729,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Accounting', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19993729}); ">
               SEC EDGAR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Government site containing 10-K reports for all U.S. public parent companies. Recent years should be available in spreadsheet format.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16950564">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16950564">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16950564">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Where can I locate industry information?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16950564">
          <div id="boxatt16950564" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link19993818">
              <a id="link_19993818" href="http://www.lexisnexis.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/hottopics/lnacademic/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19993818,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Accounting', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19993818}); ">
               Lexis-Nexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Contains Integra industry reports and news about a company and its competitors to indicate growth or decline.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19993867">
              Market Share Reporter
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Trexler Library level B 338.74 M345s
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link21514141">
              <a id="link_21514141" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www3.valueline.com/secure/vlispdf/stk5000/industry.aspx" target="_blank" onclick="hit(21514141,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Accounting', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 21514141}); ">
               ValueLine Industry Reports
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Industry reports for selected industries.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16950565">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16950565">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16950565">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I find industry ratios?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16950565">
          <div id="boxatt16950565" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link19994038">
              Annual Statement Studies
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Trexler Library level B 657.3 R627a
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19994041">
              <a id="link_19994041" href="http://www.reuters.com/finance/stocks/lookup?" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19994041,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Accounting', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19994041}); ">
               Reuters
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search for a publicly-traded company by ticker or company name, then click on "financials" to see both company and industry ratios.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
